description: Try our easy to follow Sweet & Sour Pork With Fried Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet & Sour Pork With Fried Rice
name: Sweet & Sour Pork With Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix remaining cornflour with 1 tbs water in a small bowl. Add to wok and cook for 2 minutes or until thickened. Stir in BBQ pork. Cook for 2 minutes or until heated through. To serve, top fried rice with sweet and sour pork, and scatter over spring onion.
